sentence.Network_en: Liquidus temperature is one of important parameters of production of aluminum electrolyze.
sentence.Network_cn: 电解质初晶温度是铝电解生产过程中的一个重要参数,本文研究了直接测定铝电解质初晶温度的装置.

sentence.Network_en: The requirements of chemical components, producing technology of negative aluminium foil for electrolyze capacitor are explained.
sentence.Network_cn: 阐述了电解电容器负极用铝箔对化学成分 、 生产工艺技术的要求,生产过程中的质量控制原理及方法.

sentence.Network_en: In order to electrolyze dressing wheel of metal binding agent, the electrolytic grinding fluid is developed.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了对金属结合剂砂轮电解修整, 研究并配制了电解磨削液.
